hero.title: XHS Creator Growth Assistant
hero.subtitle: Analyze creators you follow, discover trending topics, and plan your growth path to stay ahead.

network.title: Creator Network
network.description: Visualize creators you follow and their relationships. Node size represents follower count. Drag nodes to see the physics simulation.

trending.title: Hot Topics Board
trending.description: Discover the hottest topics and content angles with lower competition for faster growth.

following.title: Following Analysis
following.description: Deep analysis of creators you follow to help you find your positioning and content gaps.

growth.title: Growth Path
growth.description: Stage-based action plans and learning targets tailored to your current follower count.

selection.headline: Creator Details
selection.empty: Click a node in the network to view creator details and learn their content strategy.

footer.disclaimer: Current data is simulated for demo purposes. Real data requires XHS API integration.
